entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High zero with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
